Question.Subject: what is the stardoll.com employee code?
Question.Content: i'm tried so many times to become a employee
Question.ChosenAnswer:
What "IS" the stardoll employee code?? I think there never WAS a stardoll employee code! U seriously think the whole company would put their whole work in one code?? The stardoll "employee code" is just another spam!!
Hope I helped.. =)

Answer.Content:
What "IS" the stardoll employee code?? I think there never WAS a stardoll employee code! U seriously think the whole company would put their whole work in one code?? The stardoll "employee code" is just another spam!!
Hope I helped.. =)
Answer.Reference: I am a programmer myself (a really pathetic one but still i make games by my own), so I know whats the risk of making the employee code... How to unhack a computer?? Hackers have programs that spin around all the numbers and get the code... That means if there was a employee code, i would be found already... ;)
